# using_hg2

**Filetype:** _MATLAB&reg; function_

**Synopsis:** _Determine if the HG2 graphics engine is used_

    tf = using_hg2(fig)

IN:
    fig - handle to the figure in question.

OUT:
    tf - boolean indicating whether the HG2 graphics engine is being used
         (true) or not (false).


### Attributes


- nInputs : 1

- nOutputs : 1
